CustomField.formula: AND( RecordType.Name = "NIC-RW", ISPICKVAL(StageName,"Proposal Draft"), NOT(ISBLANK(Project_Coordinators__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(Project_Manager3__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(SPP_Office_Reviewer2__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(PNSO_Technical_Rep2__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(Contract_Specialist2__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(PNSO_Contracting_Officer2__c)) )
CustomField.label: NIC-RW Submit Approval Checkbox
